title: Cho'Gath bug
body:
Since Cho'Gath's ultimate ability changes i've used him a handful of times and never had an issue, however today I top laned with my baby Cho and found that his ultimate would not stack upon using feast to get the enemy kill to gain said stack. I haven't used Cho for a while now and only noticed this issue today, not sure how else to go about reporting this issue to Riot. I know how the ultimate works as I have been using Cho since close of BETA on NA server and have kept up to date with all patch notes. I killed two enemies before dying during this game and did not receive one stack. I did not receive any stacks at any point upon killing an enemy with feast during this game. Has anyone else encountered this error too? What should I do in going about to reporting this to Riot?
Thanks~{{champion:31}}

replies.body:
This is a bug, which belongs in the [bug report section](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) (it's on NA but that's what the OCE link takes you too).

I've played Cho'Gath but I haven't noticed this myself. I'm not a main or anything so it could just be me not noticing.
okay, thank you :) it was quite frustrating as it made a big difference late game
